Hey, i'm having a bunch of trouble recently downloading your file. It says there are 0 seeds and i'm only downloading at .5 kbps.

Still downloading, reencoding and watching. Reencode back using latest Handbrake to mkv at lower video bitrate @ 1900kbps, audio AAC5.1 @ 384kbps. I get around 370MB file of 22minutes video.

Video is excellent especially the BluRay ones. Audio is pristine DTS codec @ 1.5mbps. If u have audio receiver capable of DTS,AC3(DD) passthru SPDIF via optic cable yeah audio is superb! Mine is Yamaha RX V357. So for 720p video & DTS audio......

Audio = 10
Video = 10

oh....
